titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 27: Khulāṣat al-handasah.

msContents.summary: Copy of a work on simple arithmetic for merchants; calculations are shown; some poetry verses also included.

supportDesc.extent: 151 leaves : 199 x 121 (118 x 79) mm, bound to 203 x 124 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

origin.p: Item is undated. Possibly 18th or 19th century.

provenance: Sold by S. Bahadur Shah, Dealer in Curiosities, Mochi Gate Lahore (note pasted to outside front cover).
Formerly owned by David Eugene Smith (stamp, p. [152])
